MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Henderson Row and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.27am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.06am on Tuesday 10th November 2020.
